byline.original: Special to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: Allied purchases: Allies let plane purchase options lapse; to reopen negotiations
snippet: WASHINGTON, Feb. 29--Plans by the British and French for a new $1,000,000,000 aviation purchasing program in this country were never very definite, it was reported in high official quarters today, and options had been permitted to lapse....

headline.main: ALLIES LET OPTIONS FOR PLANES LAPSE; Official Says $1,000,000,000 Buying Plan in American Factories Was Indefinite DENIES LIMIT TO 3 TYPES Return of British and French Mission for New Negotiations Is Expected Soon

lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Feb. 29--Plans by the British and French for a new $1,000,000,000 aviation purchasing program in this country were never very definite, it was reported in high official quarters today, and options had been permitted to lapse.
